'''Conduit Power''' is an area-of-effect [[status effect]] given by active [[conduit]]s to [[player]]s touching [[water]] or [[rain]]. It grants a combination of [[Water Breathing]], [[Haste]], and [[Night Vision]].

== Effect ==
Players under the effect of Conduit Power receive all of the benefits of [[Water Breathing]], [[Night Vision]], and [[Haste]]. This means that their breath meter does not decrease, it gets filled up even underwater, they can sleep in a waterlogged [[bed]]{{only|bedrock}}, they are able to see underwater, and their mining speed increases.

Higher levels of Conduit Power can be obtained only by using commands, in which case Conduit Power X provides the same effect as Haste X, and the other two abilities are unaffected by level.

Despite the effects, Conduit Power does not stack with Water Breathing, Night Vision, or Haste. The strongest Haste effect is used, and all timers continue to count down.

{{IN|bedrock}}, because the Conduit Power effect lasts for 12 seconds above water, night vision is activated but does not show borders.

== Immune mobs ==
* [[Wither]]s and [[ender dragon]]s are immune to Conduit Power.
* All [[mob]]s that can breathe underwater are unaffected by Conduit Power.
